cause.description:
Jacob Gallant, an incoming freshman at North Carolina State University, is unable to meet the payments set forth by this institution. Let's pool our extra change and resources to get this 3.5 GPA student through the public education system.
1. Jacob Gallant deserves to go to college.
2. Jacob Gallant will make his college a better place.
3. Jacob Gallant will make a difference in the world with his college education.
cause.mission: put Jacob Gallant through four years of public college education
cause.name: Put me through college
